Package framework.lib

Interface Summary
Neighborhood<T extends Point> Defines a neighborhood around a given type of point, with a given radius.
 

Class Summary
Point An abstract representation of a point, that supports dimensions as large as the maximum array length.
Point1D A concrete 1 dimensional point that acts like a facade for the Point abstract class.
Point2D Creates a concrete 2 dimensional point implementation.
Simulation<T extends Point> Defines a simulation for a cellular automaton.
Simulation1D Gives a concrete simulation for 1 dimensional cellular automata.
Simulation2D A concrete implementation of a 2 dimensional simulation.
State<T extends Point> Represents a state of a cellular automaton, supporting an arbitrary number of dimensions.
ViewportPanel<T extends Point> A panel that contains the Viewport and lets the Viewport draw on this panel's graphics object, in Viewport's drawState.
